name: Windy Physics
description:
Super early builds of a game prototype; check out my blog for details.

Your objective: help the target number of balls reach the exit (green circle) as quickly as possible. You can move wind generator(s) around and rotate them. Press Space or the Start  button to (re)start the simulation.

Keyboard controls:

  • M: move tool
  • R: rotate tool
  • D: delete tool
  • Space: toggle start / stop
  • Shift + R: reset level
  • Shift + F: toggle full screen mode
